email_chain.subject: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for a wheat shipment from Buenos Aires to Rotterdam. The vessel has a DWT of 75000 and an LOA of 220m. The initial freight rate is USD 45/MT under FOB terms. The laycan is 1-5 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you consider USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best,
John Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. The best I can do on the freight rate is USD 42/MT. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 42/MT works for us. Please confirm the laycan and send the recap.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Wheat
- Cargo Size: 50000MT
- Load Port: Buenos Aires
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Freight Rate: USD 42/MT FOB
- Laycan: 1-5 October
- Demurrage: USD 10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The recap looks good. We are ready to proceed. Please confirm the final laycan and stem details.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Great to hear that! The laycan is confirmed as 1-5 October, and the stem will be ready by then. Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Maria
